name: Interior Framing

General information recorded
installed as per wall type

Wall checked (straight and plumb) and within tolerance
Spax screws installed as per structural design
Bracing elements installed as per S1-03

All relevant nogs (service and special/fixtures) installed, checked and correct
Service nogs checked and approved
All other nogs checked and approved
All Wall framing checks completed & Inspections carried out
